name: Goong Ob Woonsen (Thai Glass Noodle Prawn)
description: Fall in love with this goong ob woon sen recipe, a tasty blend of prawns and glass noodles.
recipeIngredient: 4 cloves garlic (crush with the back of your knife)
a handful of Chinese celery (roughly chopped)
a handful of green onions (roughly chopped)

itemListElement.text: Start by mixing water, oyster sauce, dark soy sauce, golden mountain sauce, sesame oil, sugar, and black pepper in a bowl.
itemListElement.name: Start by mixing water, oyster sauce, dark soy sauce, golden mountain sauce, sesame oil, sugar, and black pepper in a bowl.

itemListElement.text: Submerge glass noodles in water for about 5‚Äì10 minutes, or until they‚Äôre soft. Follow the instructions on the packaging.
itemListElement.name: Submerge glass noodles in water for about 5‚Äì10 minutes, or until they‚Äôre soft. Follow the instructions on the packaging.

itemListElement.text: In a non-stick pot or heavy-bottomed pan, cook the bacon until its fat renders. Then, add garlic and coriander root, cooking until the garlic turns golden.
itemListElement.name: In a non-stick pot or heavy-bottomed pan, cook the bacon until its fat renders. Then, add garlic and coriander root, cooking until the garlic turns golden.

itemListElement.text: Add the pre-soaked glass noodles to the pot, pouring the mixed sauce over them to coat.
itemListElement.name: Add the pre-soaked glass noodles to the pot, pouring the mixed sauce over them to coat.

itemListElement.text: Place ginger slices across the noodles, then arrange shrimps or prawns in a single layer on top to evenly cook in the steam.
itemListElement.name: Place ginger slices across the noodles, then arrange shrimps or prawns in a single layer on top to evenly cook in the steam.

itemListElement.text: Add a layer of Chinese celery and green onions for a fresh, crunchy contrast.
itemListElement.name: Add a layer of Chinese celery and green onions for a fresh, crunchy contrast.

itemListElement.text: Cover the pot, let everything cook together for 5 minutes, then remove from heat. Serve immediately.
itemListElement.name: Cover the pot, let everything cook together for 5 minutes, then remove from heat. Serve immediately.

keywords: glass noodles prawn, goong ob woon sen, goong ob woonsen
